Summary Note:
Ellen Louise Højgaard and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Ellen Louise Højgaard is a 56 year old and comes from Denmark.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Ellen Louise Højgaard and Nielsen tied the knot in 1998. Ellen and Nielsen have 2 children, named Josephine and Louise.
Education Background:
Ellen finished secondary school at Haderslev Katedralskole in 1986.
Ellen completed her university education at Copenhagen Business School in 1991.
Occupation History:
Ellen Louise Højgaard is a 56 year old Art Advisor from Denmark. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Ellen Louise Højgaard began her professional journey as a Art Dealer at National Gallery of Denmark in 1993, laying the foundation for future success.
In 1996, she moved to Louisiana Museum of Modern Art to work as a Gallery Owner, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2000 till now, she served as a Art Advisor at Louisiana Museum of Modern Art, solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 7860000 DKK from her earnings at all companies.
She owns townhouse in Randers, where she resides. It is worth 1778000 DKK.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns flat in Svendborg worth 1020000 DKK.

On top of that she inherited a beautiful condo in Hillerød, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1070000 DKK.
She inherited a significant sum of 13180000 DKK from her mother, a respected Tech Entrepreneur, in 2007, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Ellen as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
